actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Act to 1967 clarifying the definition of conscientious objector so as to specifically include conscientious opposition to military service in a particular war.

summary.text: Revises the definition of conscientious objector under the Military Selective Service Act of 1967 so as to include conscientious opposition to military service in a particular war. (Amends 50 App. U.S.C. 456(j))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Act to 1967 clarifying the definition of conscientious objector so as to specifically include conscientious opposition to military service in a particular war.
